overview: Bellator 124 took place on September 12, 2014 at the Compuware Arena in Plymouth Township, Michigan. The event aired live in prime time on Spike TV.  Main Card:  Emanuel Newton vs. Joey Beltran (Title Fight) Kelly Anundson vs. Liam McGeary L.C. Davis vs. Zeilton Rodrigues Tom Bagnasco vs. Ryan Couture
title: Bellator 124
